mods.abstract: Three color window card (red, blue and white on light yellow) announcing the Bluegrass Nights at the Ryman with Vince Gill, Sara Jarosz, the Boxcars, Chris Thile, Michael Daves, The Boys, The Steep Canyon Rangers, The Gibson Brothers, Rhonda Vincent, Joe Mullins and the Radio Ramblers, Dailey and Vincent, and Ricky Skaggs at the Ryman Auditorium in Nashville, Tennessee on June 21- July 26. Poster features a woodcut of a banjo.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
